text.headline: Technical Writer at TCS
text.text: Post my undergrad, it was my love for communication that made me join a program management group with a multinational Information Technology firm called TCS, that focused on improving the quality of technical documents across SDLC

text.headline: Research Assistant at UTD
text.text: I've always had a growth mindset. It was in my second year at my previous job that I hit my comfort zone. I wanted more from my life and more from my career. That's what brought me to the US in 2014, to pursue my Masters in Information Technology Management

text.headline: Product Management Intern
text.text: Translated strategic differentiators into innovative and detailed product requirements  for a new financial iOS application to help people manage their money better, through cross-functional collaboration with design, user testing and engineering teams

text.headline: Product Specialist
text.text: At Dynata, a market research firm, I was as a product specialist (a highly collaborative and data driven role within the product org), where I got to collaborate with different cross functional teams such as legal, sales, marketing and client services

text.headline: Joined Big 4
text.text: At Deloitte, I was with the Project Portfolio Management Practice, where I've helped multiple clients across 5 industries (retail/telecom/energy/govt/higher-ed), create and implement tech driven solutions to streamline business processes

text.headline: Microsoft Journey
text.text: With my two years at Microsoft, I've been a part of two different orgs, as a program manager for security org and more recently as a product manager for modern life experiences org, where I've led successful multiple cross functional projects

text.headline: Onwards and Upwards
text.text: Intentionally planning my next career move  to join a new role with a company that I believe is making a difference to planet earth
